instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-4924 Charges but cannot run on battery only.
threads.message: Any idea where to start with this? Liquid-damaged, but spill was pretty minimal. I included pre-ultrasonic pics.

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-4924 Charges but cannot run on battery only.
threads.message: Green light on charger? PPBUS voltage?

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-4924 Charges but cannot run on battery only.
threads.message: Define "charging" an orange light means nothing. What does OSX say about the battery and is percentage increasing?

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-4924 Charges but cannot run on battery only.
threads.message: Yes, for sure, orange light means nothing. The percentage is actually increasing. That's the weird thing here. OS X doesn't have any issues with the battery, all normal stats, no Replace Soon message or anything like that.

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-4924 Charges but cannot run on battery only.
threads.message: Is battery voltage making it to PPBUS? So measure voltage on PPBUS with battery only.

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-4924 Charges but cannot run on battery only.
threads.message: Nevermind, blown D7005 and R7005. I overlooked them in my search for a much more complicated problem. Thanks.
